title: Audit Trail
description: Inclusion of this schema indicates that the data record is auditable, i.e. it can be determined when the record has last been modified and by whom.

xdm:repositoryCreatedBy.title: Created by User Identifier
xdm:repositoryCreatedBy.description: User ID who has created the entity.

xdm:repositoryLastModifiedBy.title: Modified by User Identifier
xdm:repositoryLastModifiedBy.description: User ID who last modified the entity. At creation time, `modifiedByUser` is set as `createdByUser`.

xdm:createdByBatchID.title: Created by Batch Identifier
xdm:createdByBatchID.description: The dataset files in Catalog Services which has been originating the creation of the entity.

xdm:modifiedByBatchID.title: Modified by Batch Identifier
xdm:modifiedByBatchID.description: The last dataset files in Catalog Services which has modified the entity. At creation time, `modifiedByBatchID` is set as `createdByBatchID`.
